name: User Story

  teams are aligned.

labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

## User Story
Best practice utilizes the format: As a <_who_>, I want <_what_> so that <_why_>

## Acceptance Criteria 
Given <_a context_>, Then <_observable consequences_>
When <_some action_>, Then< _observable consequences_>
